channel.title: PI adding shops
channel.description:
Well, so now I'm kinda new to Project Insanity. I tried to add shops, but it didn't work.
I added the shops in shop.cfg.
Then I edit the code in npc2.py.
This is the code I got for it:
[code]def npcClick2_523(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(19) [/code]
I edited that code. First it opened the shop 1. Now I changed it to shop 19, compiled and restarted server, but it still loads shop 1? What did I do wrong?

item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum

@Vexillum wrote:

harnas:

But where can you change the cords of the shop?

Data>cfg>spawn-config

item.title: PI adding shops
item.dc:creator: @x_edward_x x edward x
item.description:
@x_edward_x wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:3, topic:388126”][quote author=x edward x link=topic=483944.msg3545373#msg3545373 date=1301165181]
pretty simple to add a shop. once you add the npc in spawn-config.cfg and you add the shop in shops.cfg with all your items. open up actionhandler.java and find this

case 541:
c.getShops().openShop(5);

copy this and paste it under that one and change the case # to your npc and the openShop(#); to whatever you set the shop number to be.

hope this helps
[/quote]
Ah, thanks. The problem was that I added it in the wrong fike :).[/quote]

np

Read full topic
